    • Constructor Detail

      • BaseD

        public BaseD()
        Default constructor

      • BaseD

        public BaseD(int n_vars,
             int n_labels,
             double[][] ranges,
             java.lang.String[] names)
        Constructor with parameters. It performs a homegeneous partition of the input space for a given number of fuzzy labels.
        Parameters:
        n_vars - int Number of input variables of the problem
        n_labels - int Number of fuzzy labels
        ranges - double[][] Range of each variable (minimum and maximum values)
        names - String[] Labels for the input attributes

        j - int the fuzzy label id
